attributes.notes:
## Absolute Masterpiece

Hollow Knight is hands down one of the best Metroidvania games ever created. The art style is breathtaking and the gameplay is incredibly tight.

**What I Love:**
- Gorgeous hand-drawn art
- Perfect controls and movement
- Incredible boss fights
- Amazing soundtrack by Christopher Larkin
- Environmental storytelling at its finest

**Current Progress:**
- Just defeated the Mantis Lords
- Exploring Deepnest (so creepy!)
- Working on Steel Soul mode

This game keeps surprising me with its depth and attention to detail.
